CHARMED.DESCRIPTION: Charmed enemies deal 50% less damage. Removed when the enemy takes attack damage.

CURE.DESCRIPTION: Use all your Holy to heal equal to the amount you lost.

HOLY.DESCRIPTION: Consumed by cards to grant additional effects.

MUTED.DESCRIPTION: Cannot play Songs until the start of your next turn.

RISEN.DESCRIPTION: The next Angelic Descent you play will refund all energy it costed.

SONG.DESCRIPTION: Triggers "When a Song is played" effects.
